content: Please enable the HTTPS protocol for your {{productName}} to ensure the correct setup work.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message encouraging users to enable HTTPS protocol for their {{productName}}. It appears in a UI component related to portal settings, prompting users to ensure correct setup work.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "لجهاز {{productName}} الخاص بك" (for your {{productName}} device) is slightly awkward and implies the protocol needs enabling on the device itself, rather than a requirement for the overall setup. A more natural phrasing would focus on the application or service using the {{productName}}.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: الرجاء تمكين بروتوكول HTTPS لـ {{productName}} لضمان عمل الإعداد الصحيح.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Quraşdırmanın düzgün işləməsini təmin etmək üçün {{productName}} üçün HTTPS protokolunu aktiv edin' is a bit literal and could be improved for natural flow in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the need for HTTPS for proper functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Funksionallığı düzgün işləməsi üçün {{productName}} üçün HTTPS protokolunu aktiv edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'работи' (raboti) is used, which means 'works'. While technically correct, 'функционира' (funktsionira) or 'е настроена правилно' (is set up correctly) might be more formal and suitable for a technical message.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Молим да активирате HTTPS протокола за вашия {{productName}}, за да се уверите, че настройката е настроена правилно.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "ensure the correct setup work" is not accurately translated. 'Ensure the correct setup work' implies that the setup will not function properly without HTTPS. A more accurate translation would emphasize correct operation, not just the setup process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Por favor, active el protocolo HTTPS para su {{productName}} para garantizar el correcto funcionamiento.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'HTTTPS' is a spelling error. It should be 'HTTPS'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: HTTPS

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Ole hyvä ja laita HTTTPS protokolla päälle {{productName}}:lle' is grammatically awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'Ota käyttöön HTTPS protokolla {{productName}}:lle'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ota käyttöön HTTPS protokolla {{productName}}:lle

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'laita päälle' can mean 'enable', 'ota käyttöön' is a more standard and natural translation for enabling a protocol in a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ota käyttöön

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ապահովելու' is misspelled. It should be 'ապահովելու'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ապահովելու

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຂອງເຈົ້າ' (of you) is somewhat informal. While not strictly incorrect, a more formal option might be preferred for a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ຂອງເຈົ້າ' with a more formal equivalent, such as 'ຂອງທ່ານ' or removing it entirely ('ສໍາລັບ {{productName}} ເພື່ອຮັບປະກັນ...') if context allows.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian phrase "iestatījumu darbam" is grammatically awkward. "Darbam" implies purpose or for the purpose of working, which isn't the intended meaning. It should be revised for clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: iestatījumu veikšanai

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "to ensure the correct setup work" is not accurately translated. 'To ensure the correct setup work' implies a desired outcome or confirmation of successful setup. The Dutch 'om er zeker van te zijn dat de installatie naar behoren werkt' is more literal, but doesn't capture the same nuance of assurance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Activeer het HTTPS-protocol voor uw {{productName}} om een correcte installatie te garanderen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'para garantir o funcionamento correto da configuração' is a bit verbose and not the most natural way to express 'to ensure the correct setup work.' A more concise and natural translation would be 'para garantir o correto funcionamento da configuração' or 'para garantir que a configuração funcione corretamente'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: para garantir o correto funcionamento da configuração

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'spațiul' is somewhat vague. While technically correct, it could be improved for clarity. 'Instanța' or 'mediul' might be better depending on the specific context of 'productName'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Activați protocol HTTPS pentru instanța dvs {{productName}} pentru a asigura functionarea corecta a configuratiei.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'functionarea corecta a configuratiei' is a bit wordy. 'Configurarea corectă' is more concise and natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Activați protocol HTTPS pentru instanța dvs {{productName}} pentru a asigura configurarea corectă.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ක‍්‍රියාත්මක' (kriyātmaka) is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might be 'පහසු කරන්න' (pahusu karanna).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කෘපya ඔබගේ {{productName}} සඳහා HTTPS ප්‍රොටොකෝලය පහසු කරන්න, නිවැරදි සැකසුම් වැඩ පිළිවෙල සහතික කිරීම සඳහා.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'නිවැරදි සැකසුම් වැඩ පිළිවෙල සහතික කිරීම සඳහා' could be slightly improved for flow. While technically correct, it reads a little stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කෘපya ඔබගේ {{productName}} සඳහා HTTPS ප්‍රොටොකෝලය පහසු කරන්න, නිවැරදි සැකසුම් සහතික කිරීම සඳහා.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "correct setup work" is awkward. "korektnú prácu nastavení" doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'correct setup'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prosím, povoľte protokol HTTPS pre váš priestor {{productName}}, aby ste zabezpečili správne nastavenie.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Omogočite protokol HTTPS za vaš {{productName}}, da zagotovite pravilno namestitev.' is a literal translation but sounds slightly unnatural in Slovenian. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning more effectively.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omogočite uporabo HTTPS protokola za vaš {{productName}}, da zagotovite pravilno namestitev.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'омогућите' is spelled correctly, but might be slightly formal for the context. A more conversational alternative could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Молимо укључите HTTPS протокол за ваш {{productName}} како би се осигурало да правилно ради.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'kako bi se osiguralo da pravilno radi' is a bit awkward in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be 'da bi pravilno funkcionisalo' or 'da bi ispravno radilo'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: da bi pravilno funkcionisalo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'space' ('простору') in the Ukrainian translation doesn't accurately reflect the intended meaning of 'product'. 'Product' refers to a software product or instance, not a physical space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Увімкніть протокол HTTPS для вашого продукту {{productName}}, щоб забезпечити правильне налаштування.
